languages.name: node.js
languages.description: Node.js is a platform built on Chrome's JavaScript runtime for easily building fast, scalable network applications.

languages.name: groovy
languages.description: Groovy is an object-oriented programming language for the Java platform. It is a dynamic language with features similar to those of Python, Ruby, Perl, and Smalltalk.

languages.name: grails
languages.description: Grails is an open source web application framework that uses the Groovy programming language.

languages.name: java
languages.description: Java is a general-purpose, concurrent, class-based, object-oriented computer programming language that is specifically designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

languages.name: mysql
languages.description: the world's most widely used[5][6] open-source relational database management system (RDBMS)

languages.name: hibernate
languages.description: Object-relational mapping (ORM) library for the Java language, providing a framework for mapping an object-oriented domain model to a traditional relational database.

languages.name: mongodb
languages.description: MongoDB (from 'humongous') is a cross-platform document-oriented database system.

languages.name: html
languages.description: HyperText Markup Language (HTML) is the main markup language for creating web pages and other information that can be displayed in a web browser.

languages.name: jade
languages.description: Jade is a high performance template engine heavily influenced by Haml and implemented with JavaScript for node.

languages.name: css
languages.description: Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation semantics (the look and formatting) of a document written in a markup language.

languages.name: less
languages.description: The dynamic stylesheet language. LESS extends CSS with dynamic behavior such as variables, mixins, operations and functions.

languages.name: javascript
languages.description: JavaScript is a prototype-based scripting language with dynamic typing and has first-class functions.

languages.name: backbone
languages.description: Backbone supplies structure to JavaScript-heavy applications.

languages.name: angular
languages.description: AngularJS is what HTML would have been, had it been designed for building web-apps.
